items.sentence: I can\'t bake bread because I don\'t have an oven.
I\'m the only person Tom knows who can play chess.
It seems like Tom doesn\'t really want to be here.
I just remembered there\'s something I have to do.
I looked all over for Tom, but couldn\'t find him.
Tom told me he had studied French for three years.
Tom told me that he thought I should go on a diet.
Tom told me that he thought it would rain all day.
Tom told me that he was going to Boston next week.
I\'m not interested in going to the baseball game.
